bug.author: ashutosh1919
bug.summary: There are no documentations related to decode_predictions() and preprocess_input() in any keras.applications
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/applications?version=nightly>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/applications?version=nightly</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
The doc corresponding to these two functions must be added in each application model doc. Are you planning to also submit a pull request to fix the issue? Yes, Will mention these issue soon in those PRs.
